article.headline: Campbell 83, Coastal Carolina 63
article.story: BUIES CREEK, N.C. (AP) -- Five players scored in double digits for Campbell in an 83-63 victory over Coastal Carolina on Thursday. Jonathan Rodriguez led the Camels with 17 points and nine rebounds, while Russ Gibson and Ledell Eackles had 14 points apiece. Reggie Bishop scored 13 points, and Eric Smith added 11 for Campbell (2-0). The Camels shot 45.6 percent from the floor, leading 40-27 at halftime. For the Chanticleers, Jack Leasure led all scorers with 19 points and hit 5-of-10 from 3-point range. Joseph Harris scored 14 points, grabbed 13 rebounds and had three blocks. Coastal Carolina (0-2) led by as many as nine points in the first half, but Campbell regained control, scoring 21 of its points off Chanticleer turnovers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
